allow: Bash(# Check FreeTDS configuration echo ""=== FreeTDS Configuration ==="" cat /etc/freetds.conf || cat /c/msys64/ucrt64/etc/freetds.conf || echo ""Config not found at standard locations"" echo """" echo ""=== tsql version output \(shows TDS version\) ==="" echo ""exit"" | tsql -H 107.22.178.254 -p 5000 -U sa -P innsoft247 2>&1)

Bash(# Check what''s at approximately row 7000 position \(7000 * 68 avg = ~476000 bytes\) # Look at hex dump from ~470000 to ~490000 and see a few rows dd if=/c/_innovative/_source/sbn-services/SRM/sql_source/data_transfer_srm/ibs_ub_request_text.bcp bs=1 skip=470000 count=2000)

Bash(# Check what''s at approximately row 7000 position \(7000 * 68 avg = ~476000 bytes\) dd if=/c/_innovative/_source/sbn-services/SRM/sql_source/data_transfer_srm/ibs_ub_request_text.bcp bs=1 skip=470000 count=2000)
Bash("/c/Program Files/Microsoft SQL Server/Client SDK/ODBC/170/Tools/Binn/bcp.exe" srm.dbo.ub_request_text in test_msbcp.txt -S 127.0.0.1,1433 -U sa -P innsoft247 -c)
